anaging maternal and child health programmes:  a practical guide
Teaching skills
Describe the skill, why it is important, when to use it and
the steps involved to perform it.
Demonstrate the skill.  Simulate the work environments of
the participants and explain what is being demonstrated.
Arrange practice sessions and give feedback on how each
participant performed.   This is the most important part ofteaching skills.
Practice methods for skills training include role-play, case-
